details.title: Comments on "Maximum likelihood angle extractor for two closely spaced targets"
details.abstract: For original paper see ibid., vol.1, p.183-203 (January 2002). This correspondence corrects a minor error in the description of maximum likelihood (ML) estimators that extract angle measurements from two unresolved targets using measurements from a monopulse radar.
details.journal_title: IEEE Transactions on Aerospace and Electronic Systems
